title: Item Crafted
description: An item was acquired (picked up) by a player.

fields.description: Identifier of the player that has spawned.
True if a crafting table was used to craft an item.
True if a search bar was used to discover an item to craft.
True if an item was crafted automatically.
Tab that was first started on when crafting started.
Tab that was first ended on when crafting started.
True if the crafting filter focused on present ingredients.
True if the recipe book was shown to players.
Amount of items that were crafted.
